note:
A little concerned, and a lot of curious. Software Engineer, previous game dev, aspiring indie game dev. Discussing Star Wars, Nintendo, Marvel, Disney, Apple. Seattle, WA.

I get it wrong sometimes, but mistakes that lead to change are successes.
